name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Window Closer for Asana Desktop Links

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically closes the launched window shared Asana links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to automatically close the window after following an "Open in Desktop App" link for Asana.
